data.name: Deus Ex Machina - The Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Deus Ex Machina - The Album


The full soundtrack to the groundbreaking 1984 video game Deus Ex Machina. Featuring Ian Dury, Jon Pertwee, Frankie Howerd, Donna Bailey this is a games soundtrack like no other!

  • 1 I Am Machine (feat. Jon Pertwee, Donna Bailey & Ian Dury) 4:55
  • 2 All the Screen (feat. Jon Pertwee & Donna Bailey) 4:01
  • 3 Fertilizer (feat. Ian Dury) 1:53
  • 4 Foetus 1:55
  • 5 Asked to Be Born (feat. The Children of Warblington School) 2:39
  • 6 School (feat. Frankie Howerd & Donna Bailey) 3:58
  • 7 Love (feat. Donna Bailey, Jon Pertwee & Frankie Howerd) 3:08
  • 8 War Crimes Are Easy (feat. Frankie Howerd & Jon Pertwee) 5:47
  • 9 Justice (feat. Donna Bailey, EP Thompson & Jon Pertwee) 5:02
  • 10 Old Age (feat. Jon Pertwee) 9:24
  • 11 Replay (feat. Ian Dury & Jon Pertwee) 2:39
  • 12 Outro (feat. Ian Dury) 3:26
